body:
I'd like some more tabs in our profiles please.

SoundCloud, DeviantArt, Imgur and Google + Thanks :)

SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/kevysama
DeviantArt: http://kevysama.deviantart.com/
Imgur: http://kevychan.imgur.com/ [Don't Judge what I play, a Gamer plays any Game they want]
Google+: https://plus.google.com/u/0/110234665814829651928/posts
